official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to allow insured banks to amortize losses on agricultural loans over a 10-year period and losses on other loans over a 5-year period.

summary.text: Bank Loan Loss Amortization Act - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to allow insured banks to amortize losses on qualified agricultural loans over a ten-year period and losses on other loans over a five-year period.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to allow insured banks to amortize losses on agricultural loans over a 10-year period and losses on other loans over a 5-year period.
